attributes.action: help out the true british before you help out others
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: us true brits feel that we as a country are being neglected, we can claim hardly any benefits, cant get houses or jobs, we have to scrimp and scrape to provide for our families, then you ask why people turn to crime help us sort out the true brits before you help out others!!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
